message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this product. I think it would be incredibly valuable for you.  I'm asking for $15,000 to start. What do you think?
Hi Alice, thanks for the offer.  $15,000 is a bit high for me right now.  I could do $9,000. Would that work for you?
Hi Bob, thanks for the offer, but $9,000 is too low for me. This product is truly top-of-the-line and will bring you a lot of value. Could you do $13,500?
Hi Alice, I appreciate you working with me on this.  While I agree this is a good product, $13,500 is still a bit above my budget. How about $11,000?
